penalty.name: No OS patches
penalty.reason: The operating system did not have any patches installed.
penalty.remediation: Patch the operating system with recent updates

penalty.name: No OS security patches
penalty.reason: The operating system did not have any security patches installed.
penalty.remediation: Patch the operating system with recent security updates

penalty.name: OS security patch date is too old
penalty.reason: The operating system's latest security patch install date ({0}) is {1} days old which is beyond the limit of {2} days
penalty.remediation: Patch the operating system with recent security updates

penalty.name: The average number of days between security patch installation is too long
penalty.reason: The average days between installed security patches is {0} days which is beyond the limit of {1} days
penalty.remediation: Patch the operating system with security updates within 30 days of patch release
